programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Comprehensive training in beauty and fashion with hands-on experience from industry professionals.
programs.makeupDesc: Master the art of makeup from basics to advanced techniques. Learn color theory, skin care, and special effects makeup.
programs.hairDesc: Professional hair cutting, coloring, and styling courses. From trendy cuts to bridal styles and everything in between.
programs.beautyDesc: Complete beauty therapy training including skincare, waxing, threading, and wellness therapies.
programs.fashionDesc: Learn fashion design principles, pattern making, sewing, and collection creation from industry experts.

about.title: About LISA College
about.para1: Since 2010, LISA College has been at the forefront of beauty and fashion education, producing highly skilled professionals who excel in their careers.
about.para2: Our state-of-the-art facilities, experienced instructors, and industry partnerships ensure that our students receive world-class training and career opportunities.
about.point1: Contemporary curriculum aligned with industry standards

testimonials.title: Student Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our successful graduates who are making waves in the beauty and fashion industry.
testimonials.test1: LISA College completely transformed my career. The hands-on training and mentorship I received helped me launch my own makeup line. Best decision ever!
testimonials.test2: The fashion design program is incredible. The instructors are industry professionals who taught me everything I needed to know to work with top fashion brands.
testimonials.test3: From zero experience to opening my own salon in just 10 months. LISA College's curriculum and support made it all possible.
